name: QuestionnaireCCARSSecuritySupervisionRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Security Supervision Rating
description: Extent to which the person is in need of increased supervision.

concept.display: No special security or supervision precautions needed
Occasional behavior problems are present and require low levels of security and supervision.
Requires moderate levels of security and supervision due to intermittent high-risk and/or dangerous behaviors.
Close supervision, seclusion, suicide watch, or controlled medication administration may be necessary due to severe behavioral problems. Walkaway/escape potential may be high.
Requires constant supervision or a secure environment due to behaviors that are likely to result in injury to self or others
